summary: A computer-scientist/novelist reunites with his childhood friend, hacks into government databases, and faces the dire and fateful consequences of the mystical actions he obtained as a child.
cast: Neil Breen|Klara Landrat|Jennifer Autry|Victoria Viveiros|David Silva|John Henry Hoffman|Gloria Hoffman|Danielle Andrade|David Scott|Steven Nelson|Richard Hunsacker|David Miranda|JR Thompson|Ryan Collis|Jaime Reborn|Jack Batoni|Brianna Borden|Mark Bettencort|Jesse Mendez|Monique Batoni|Steve Silverstein|Greg Hobbs|Morgan Villanueva|Tim Duclos|Dasey Cameron|George Ehret|Noah Segura
title: Fateful Findings
